verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after מ֔וֹת <WH4194> the death שְׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> of the two בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> sons אַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> of Aaron בְּקָרְבָתָ֥ם <WH7126> when they offered לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיָּמֻֽתוּ׃ <WH4191> and died

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses דַּבֵּר֮ <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> about אַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> unto Aaron אָחִיךָ֒ <WH251> thy brother וְאַל־ <WH408> nay יָבֹ֤א <WH935> that he come בְכָל־ <WH3605> any עֵת֙ <WH6256> not at all times אֶל־ <WH413> into הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> into the holy מִבֵּ֖ית <WH1004> [place] within לַפָּרֹ֑כֶת <WH6532> the vail אֶל־ <WH413> about פְּנֵ֨י <WH6440> before הַכַּפֹּ֜רֶת <WH3727> the mercy seat אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> over הָאָרֹן֙ <WH727> which [is] upon the ark וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> or יָמ֔וּת <WH4191> that he die כִּ֚י <WH3588> in בֶּֽעָנָ֔ן <WH6051> in the cloud אֵרָאֶ֖ה <WH7200> not for I will appear עַל־ <WH5921> over הַכַּפֹּֽרֶת׃ <WH3727> upon the mercy

בְּזֹ֛את <WH2063> Thus יָבֹ֥א <WH935> come אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> shall Aaron אֶל־ <WH413> about הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> into the holy בְּפַ֧ר <WH6499> bullock בֶּן־ <WH1121> afflicted בָּקָ֛ר <WH1241> bull לְחַטָּ֖את <WH2403> for a sin offering וְאַ֥יִל <WH352> and a ram לְעֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> for a burnt offering

כְּתֹֽנֶת־ <WH3801> coat בַּ֨ד <WH906> linen קֹ֜דֶשׁ <WH6944> the holy יִלְבָּ֗שׁ <WH3847> He shall put on וּמִֽכְנְסֵי־ <WH4370> breeches בַד֮ <WH906> and he shall have the linen יִהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> shall be next בְּשָׂרוֹ֒ <WH1320> upon his flesh וּבְאַבְנֵ֥ט <WH73> girdle בַּד֙ <WH906> with a linen יַחְגֹּ֔ר <WH2296> and shall be girded וּבְמִצְנֶ֥פֶת <WH4701> mitre בַּ֖ד <WH906> and with the linen יִצְנֹ֑ף <WH6801> shall he be attired בִּגְדֵי־ <WH899> garments קֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> [are] holy הֵ֔ם <WH1992> these וְרָחַ֥ץ <WH7364> therefore shall he wash בַּמַּ֛יִם <WH4325> in water אֶת־ <WH853> בְּשָׂר֖וֹ <WH1320> his flesh וּלְבֵשָֽׁם׃ <WH3847> and [so] put them on

וּמֵאֵ֗ת <WH853> עֲדַת֙ <WH5712> of the congregation בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel יִקַּ֛ח <WH3947> And he shall take שְׁנֵֽי־ <WH8147> two שְׂעִירֵ֥י <WH8163> kids עִזִּ֖ים <WH5795> of the goats לְחַטָּ֑את <WH2403> for a sin offering וְאַ֥יִל <WH352> ram אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> and one לְעֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> for a burnt offering

וְהִקְרִ֧יב <WH7126> shall offer אַהֲרֹ֛ן <WH175> And Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> פַּ֥ר <WH6499> his bullock הַחַטָּ֖את <WH2403> of the sin offering אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which ל֑וֹ וְכִפֶּ֥ר <WH3722> and make an atonement בַּעֲד֖וֹ <WH1157> which [is] for himself וּבְעַ֥ד <WH1157> and for בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> for himself and for his house

וְלָקַ֖ח <WH3947> And he shall take אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> the two הַשְּׂעִירִ֑ם <WH8163> goats וְהֶעֱמִ֤יד <WH5975> and present אֹתָם֙ <WH853> לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> them before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> [at] the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וְנָתַ֧ן <WH5414> shall cast אַהֲרֹ֛ן <WH175> And Aaron עַל־ <WH5921> for שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> upon the two הַשְּׂעִירִ֖ם <WH8163> goats גּוֹרָל֑וֹת <WH1486> lots גּוֹרָ֤ל <WH1486> lot אֶחָד֙ <WH259> one לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> for the LORD וְגוֹרָ֥ל <WH1486> lot אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> and the other לַעֲזָאזֵֽל׃ <WH5799> for the scapegoat

וְהִקְרִ֤יב <WH7126> shall bring אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> And Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׂעִ֔יר <WH8163> the goat אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which עָלָ֥ה <WH5927> fell עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> and הַגּוֹרָ֖ל <WH1486> lot לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> upon which the LORD'S וְעָשָׂ֖הוּ <WH6213> and offer חַטָּֽאת׃ <WH2403> him [for] a sin offering

וְהַשָּׂעִ֗יר <WH8163> But the goat אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which עָלָ֨ה <WH5927> fell עָלָ֤יו <WH5921> and הַגּוֹרָל֙ <WH1486> on which the lot לַעֲזָאזֵ֔ל <WH5799> to be the scapegoat יָֽעֳמַד־ <WH5975> shall be presented חַ֛י <WH2416> alive לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD לְכַפֵּ֣ר <WH3722> to make an atonement עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> upon לְשַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> with him [and] to let him go אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> לַעֲזָאזֵ֖ל <WH5799> for a scapegoat הַמִּדְבָּֽרָה׃ <WH4057> into the wilderness

וְהִקְרִ֨יב <WH7126> shall bring אַהֲרֹ֜ן <WH175> And Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> פַּ֤ר <WH6499> the bullock הַֽחַטָּאת֙ <WH2403> of the sin offering אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which ל֔וֹ וְכִפֶּ֥ר <WH3722> which [is] for himself and shall make an atonement בַּֽעֲד֖וֹ <WH1157> about וּבְעַ֣ד <WH1157> and for בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> for himself and for his house וְשָׁחַ֛ט <WH7819> and shall kill אֶת־ <WH853> פַּ֥ר <WH6499> the bullock הַֽחַטָּ֖את <WH2403> of the sin offering אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which לֽוֹ׃

וְלָקַ֣ח <WH3947> And he shall take מְלֹֽא־ <WH4393> full הַ֠מַּחְתָּה <WH4289> a censer גַּֽחֲלֵי־ <WH1513> coals אֵ֞שׁ <WH784> of fire מֵעַ֤ל <WH5921> upon הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> from off the altar מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וּמְלֹ֣א <WH4393> full חָפְנָ֔יו <WH2651> and his hands קְטֹ֥רֶת <WH7004> incense סַמִּ֖ים <WH5561> of sweet דַּקָּ֑ה <WH1851> beaten small וְהֵבִ֖יא <WH935> and bring מִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> [it] within לַפָּרֹֽכֶת׃ <WH6532> the vail

וְנָתַ֧ן <WH5414> And he shall put אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַקְּטֹ֛רֶת <WH7004> the incense עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> upon the fire לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְכִסָּ֣ה ׀ <WH3680> may cover עֲנַ֣ן <WH6051> that the cloud הַקְּטֹ֗רֶת <WH7004> of the incense אֶת־ <WH853> הַכַּפֹּ֛רֶת <WH3727> the mercy seat אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that עַל־ <WH5921> is on הָעֵד֖וּת <WH5715> that [is] upon the testimony וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> otherwise יָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> that he die

וְלָקַח֙ <WH3947> And he shall take מִדַּ֣ם <WH1818> of the blood הַפָּ֔ר <WH6499> of the bullock וְהִזָּ֧ה <WH5137> and sprinkle בְאֶצְבָּע֛וֹ <WH676> [it] with his finger עַל־ <WH5921> in פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> and before הַכַּפֹּ֖רֶת <WH3727> upon the mercy seat קֵ֑דְמָה <WH6924> eastward וְלִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> front הַכַּפֹּ֗רֶת <WH3727> the mercy seat יַזֶּ֧ה <WH5137> shall he sprinkle שֶֽׁבַע־ <WH7651> seven פְּעָמִ֛ים <WH6471> times מִן־ <WH4480> some הַדָּ֖ם <WH1818> of the blood בְּאֶצְבָּעֽוֹ׃ <WH676> with his finger

וְשָׁחַ֞ט <WH7819> Then shall he kill אֶת־ <WH853> שְׂעִ֤יר <WH8163> the goat הַֽחַטָּאת֙ <WH2403> of the sin offering אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לָעָ֔ם <WH5971> that [is] for the people וְהֵבִיא֙ <WH935> and bring אֶת־ <WH853> דָּמ֔וֹ <WH1818> his blood אֶל־ <WH413> about מִבֵּ֖ית <WH1004> within לַפָּרֹ֑כֶת <WH6532> the vail וְעָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> and do אֶת־ <WH854> for דָּמ֗וֹ <WH1818> with that blood כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> as he did לְדַ֣ם <WH1818> with the blood הַפָּ֔ר <WH6499> of the bullock וְהִזָּ֥ה <WH5137> and sprinkle אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> on הַכַּפֹּ֖רֶת <WH3727> it upon the mercy seat וְלִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> and before הַכַּפֹּֽרֶת׃ <WH3727> the mercy seat

וְכִפֶּ֣ר <WH3722> And he shall make an atonement עַל־ <WH5921> for הַקֹּ֗דֶשׁ <WH6944> for the holy מִטֻּמְאֹת֙ <WH2932> [place] because of the uncleanness בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וּמִפִּשְׁעֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6588> and because of their transgressions לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all חַטֹּאתָ֑ם <WH2403> in all their sins וְכֵ֤ן <WH3651> and thus יַעֲשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> and so shall he do לְאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> for the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation הַשֹּׁכֵ֣ן <WH7931> that remaineth אִתָּ֔ם <WH854> in בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> among them in the midst טֻמְאֹתָֽם׃ <WH2932> of their uncleanness

וְכָל־ <WH3605> and for all אָדָ֞ם <WH120> And there shall be no man לֹא־ <WH3808> no יִהְיֶ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> shall be in בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֗ד <WH4150> of the congregation בְּבֹא֛וֹ <WH935> when he goeth לְכַפֵּ֥ר <WH3722> in to make an atonement בַּקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> in the holy עַד־ <WH5704> until צֵאת֑וֹ <WH3318> [place] until he come out וְכִפֶּ֤ר <WH3722> and have made an atonement בַּעֲדוֹ֙ <WH1157> about וּבְעַ֣ד <WH1157> and for בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> for himself and for his household וּבְעַ֖ד <WH1157> about כָּל־ <WH3605> and for all קְהַ֥ל <WH6951> and for all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְיָצָ֗א <WH3318> And he shall go out אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמִּזְבֵּ֛חַ <WH4196> unto the altar אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> is לִפְנֵֽי־ <WH6440> that [is] before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God וְכִפֶּ֣ר <WH3722> and make an atonement עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and וְלָקַ֞ח <WH3947> for it and shall take מִדַּ֤ם <WH1818> of the blood הַפָּר֙ <WH6499> of the bullock וּמִדַּ֣ם <WH1818> and of the blood הַשָּׂעִ֔יר <WH8163> of the goat וְנָתַ֛ן <WH5414> and put עַל־ <WH5921> on קַרְנ֥וֹת <WH7161> [it] upon the horns הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> of the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וְהִזָּ֨ה <WH5137> And he shall sprinkle עָלָ֧יו <WH5921> and מִן־ <WH4480> some הַדָּ֛ם <WH1818> of the blood בְּאֶצְבָּע֖וֹ <WH676> upon it with his finger שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> seven פְּעָמִ֑ים <WH6471> times וְטִהֲר֣וֹ <WH2891> and cleanse וְקִדְּשׁ֔וֹ <WH6942> it and hallow מִטֻּמְאֹ֖ת <WH2932> it from the uncleanness בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְכִלָּה֙ <WH3615> And when he hath made an end מִכַּפֵּ֣ר <WH3722> of reconciling אֶת־ <WH853> הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> the holy וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> [place] and the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> and the altar וְהִקְרִ֖יב <WH7126> he shall bring אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׂעִ֥יר <WH8163> goat הֶחָֽי׃ <WH2416> the live

וְסָמַ֨ךְ <WH5564> shall lay אַהֲרֹ֜ן <WH175> And Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> both [יָדֹו כ] (יָדָ֗יו <WH3027> of his hands ק) עַ֨ל <WH5921> over רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head הַשָּׂעִיר֮ <WH8163> goat הַחַי֒ <WH2416> of the live וְהִתְוַדָּ֣ה <WH3034> and confess עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> over אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲוֹנֹת֙ <WH5771> over him all the iniquities בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all פִּשְׁעֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6588> and all their transgressions לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all חַטֹּאתָ֑ם <WH2403> in all their sins וְנָתַ֤ן <WH5414> putting אֹתָם֙ <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> over רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> them upon the head הַשָּׂעִ֔יר <WH8163> of the goat וְשִׁלַּ֛ח <WH7971> and shall send [him] away בְּיַד־ <WH3027> his hands אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man עִתִּ֖י <WH6261> of a fit הַמִּדְבָּֽרָה׃ <WH4057> into the wilderness

וְנָשָׂ֨א <WH5375> shall bear הַשָּׂעִ֥יר <WH8163> And the goat עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> and אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲוֹנֹתָ֖ם <WH5771> upon him all their iniquities אֶל־ <WH413> about אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> unto a land גְּזֵרָ֑ה <WH1509> not inhabited וְשִׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> and he shall let go אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׂעִ֖יר <WH8163> the goat בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> in the wilderness

וּבָ֤א <WH935> shall come אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> And Aaron אֶל־ <WH413> into אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> into the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation וּפָשַׁט֙ <WH6584> and shall put off אֶת־ <WH853> בִּגְדֵ֣י <WH899> garments הַבָּ֔ד <WH906> the linen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לָבַ֖שׁ <WH3847> which he put on בְּבֹא֣וֹ <WH935> when he went אֶל־ <WH413> into הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> into the holy וְהִנִּיחָ֖ם <WH3240> [place] and shall leave שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וְרָחַ֨ץ <WH7364> And he shall wash אֶת־ <WH853> בְּשָׂר֤וֹ <WH1320> his flesh בַמַּ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> with water בְּמָק֣וֹם <WH4725> place קָד֔וֹשׁ <WH6918> in the holy וְלָבַ֖שׁ <WH3847> and put on אֶת־ <WH853> בְּגָדָ֑יו <WH899> his garments וְיָצָ֗א <WH3318> and come forth וְעָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> and offer אֶת־ <WH853> עֹֽלָתוֹ֙ <WH5930> his burnt offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֹלַ֣ת <WH5930> and the burnt offering הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people וְכִפֶּ֥ר <WH3722> and make an atonement בַּעֲד֖וֹ <WH1157> about וּבְעַ֥ד <WH1157> and for הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> for himself and for the people
